qas.question: What was the software attach rate in the US for the 360 by March of 2008?

answers.text: 7.5 games per console in the US

qas.question: What are two prominent 360 exclusive franchises?

answers.text: the Halo franchise and Gears of War

qas.question: Why were early multi-platform games considered superior on the 360?

answers.text: the difficulties of programming for the PS3

qas.question: The 360 earned 38 nominations and 12 wins from what organization in 2007?
Microsoft hoped to have how many titles available for the 360 by the end of 2008?
How many games were available for the Xbox in 2007?
How many nominations did the PS3 receive?
How many awards did the Wii win?
How many games did the average person in Europe have for the PS3?

plausible_answers.text: Devil May Cry, Ace Combat, Virtua Fighter, Grand Theft Auto IV, Final Fantasy XIII, Tekken 6, Metal Gear Solid : Rising, and L.A. Noire

qas.question: What PS3 exclusives launched in 2006 that the the Xbox 360 did not have access to?

context: The Xbox 360's advantage over its competitors was due to the release of high profile titles from both first party and third party developers. The 2007 <a3_0>Game Critics Awards<a3_0/> honored the platform with <b6_0>38<b6_0/> nominations and <b7_0>12<b7_0/> wins – more than any other platform. By March 2008, the Xbox 360 had reached a software attach rate of <a0_0>7.5 games per console in the US<a0_0/>; the rate was 7.0 in Europe, while its competitors were <b8_0>3.8<b8_0/> (PS3) and 3.5 (Wii), according to Microsoft. At the 2008 Game Developers Conference, Microsoft announced that it expected <a4_0>over <b5_0>1,000<b5_0/><a4_0/> games available for Xbox 360 by the end of the year. As well as enjoying exclusives such as additions to <a1_0>the Halo franchise and Gears of War<a1_0/>, the Xbox 360 has managed to gain a simultaneous release of titles that were initially planned to be PS3 exclusives, including <b9_0>Devil May Cry, Ace Combat, Virtua Fighter, Grand Theft Auto IV, Final Fantasy XIII, Tekken 6, Metal Gear Solid : Rising, and L.A. Noire<b9_0/>. In addition, Xbox 360 versions of cross-platform games were generally considered superior to their PS3 counterparts in 2006 and 2007, due in part to <a2_0>the difficulties of programming for the PS3<a2_0/>.
